choices.C: An individual who makes a decision on the classifications and the severity of the incident identified
choices.D: An individual responsible for the remediation and resolution of the incident that occurred
choices.A: An individual responsible for conveying company details after an incident
choices.B: An individual who receives the initial IR alerts and leads the IR team in all the IR activities

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
as per CND book, IR Custodian is the individual responsible for remediation and resolution of the incident. Page 2117

Selected Answer: D
Cyber_Bunny is right, CND Book P.2117

Selected Answer: C
Answwer is C, CND Book P.1939

Selected Answer: C
Use the filter
tcp.flags==0x003 to
detect a SYN/Fl N
attack

questions.question_text: Which among the following filter is used to detect a SYN/FIN attack?

choices.A: Identify the indicators of exposure->visualize the attack surface->simulate the attack->reduce the attack surface
choices.C: Identify the indicators of exposure->simulate the attack->visualize the attack surface->reduce the attack surface
choices.B: Visualize the attack surface->simulate the attack->identify the indicators of exposure->reduce the attack surface
choices.D: Visualize the attack surface->identify the indicators of exposure->simulate the attack->reduce the attack surface

questions.question_text: Choose the correct order of steps to analyze the attack surface.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D

questions.question_text: Leslie, the network administrator of Livewire Technologies, has been recommending multilayer inspection firewalls to deploy the companyâ€™s infrastructure. What layers of the TCP/IP model can it protect?

To provide optimum security while enabling safe/necessary services, blocking known dangerous services, and making employees accountable for their online activity, what Internet Access policy would Brian, the network administrator, have to choose?

discussion.content: This question might has some wrong,blocking known dangerous services is permissive but making employees accountable is prudent.
